text: Alfa Matrix is a Belgian record label. Founded in 2001, the label releases musical styles including aggrotech, industrial music, dark elektro, synthpop, and electronica. Based in Brussels, the label consists of label and artists manager Séba Dolimont, promo manager Bernard Van Isacker, and head of design Benoît Blanchart. ==Artists== *32CRASH *Acylum *Adam X *Agonised by Love *!AïBoFoRcEn<\- *amGod *Alien Vampires *Armageddon Dildos *Aesthetische *Avarice In Audio *Ayria *Bruderschaft *Cosmic Armchair *Crisk *Cynical Existence *Diffuzion *Diskonnekted *Dream Recall *DR.
